dt-option.name: keys.editOnFocus
dt-option.summary: Control if editing should be activated immediately upon focus

type.description: `true` to enable editing on focus, `false` to disable.

dt-option.default: The cell is not automatically put into inline editing mode when the cell is focused.
dt-option.description: When used with Editor (`-init keys.editor`), inline editing will not be triggered by KeyTable until a key value is pressed when a cell is focused (similar to Excel). However, you may wish to immediately place the cell into edit mode when the focus happens. This option provides that ability.

example.title: Immediately trigger inline editing, when the cell is focused.
